title: Hamas Government Chief, 2 Senior Leaders Killed In Strike, Says Israel
content: The Israeli military on Thursday said a strike three months ago killed three senior Hamas leaders in Gaza, where the army has been battling the Palestinian operatives for nearly a year.
summary: The Israeli military on Thursday said a strike three months ago killed three senior Hamas leaders in Gaza, where the army has been battling the Palestinian operatives for nearly a year.

title: Georgia Signs Into New Law Bill Despite Warnings, EU Thinks Its Queerphobic
content: The speaker of Georgia's parliament on Thursday signed into law a bill similar to Russian legislation that curbs the rights of LGBTQ people, despite warnings from the EU.
summary: The speaker of Georgia's parliament on Thursday signed into law a bill similar to Russian legislation that curbs the rights of LGBTQ people, despite warnings from the EU.

title: Japan's New PM To Introduce Happiness Index In First Parliamentary Speech
content: Japan's Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba will propose a new happiness index during his first parliamentary policy speech on Friday, local media have reported.
summary: Japan's Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba will propose a new happiness index during his first parliamentary policy speech on Friday, local media have reported.

title: Musk Secretly Funded Right-Wing Group Long Before Trump Endorsement: Sources
content: Elon Musk secretly funded a conservative political group in recent years, according to four people familiar with his donations.
summary: Elon Musk secretly funded a conservative political group in recent years, according to four people familiar with his donations.

title: Annular Solar Eclipse's 'Ring of Fire' Seen In Easter Island And Patagonia
content: The moon blotted out most of the sun across the Pacific Ocean on Wednesday afternoon, giving just a few specks of land an impressive annular "ring of fire" eclipse.
summary: The moon blotted out most of the sun across the Pacific Ocean on Wednesday afternoon, giving just a few specks of land an impressive annular "ring of fire" eclipse.

title: "You Will Never Be My President": Indian User's Reply to Trump Goes Viral
content: A month ahead of the US election, with campaigning at a peak, former President Donald Trump's automated messages have sparked a viral reaction with an Indian user receiving an update today.
summary: A month ahead of the US election, with campaigning at a peak, former President Donald Trump's automated messages have sparked a viral reaction with an Indian user receiving an update today.

title: Harris' Husband Slapped Ex Girlfriend For Flirting With Another Man: Report
content: The report said Kamala Harris' husband Douglas Emhoff allegedly struck the woman, a New York attorney, in the face while waiting in a valet line in 2012.
summary: The report said Kamala Harris' husband Douglas Emhoff allegedly struck the woman, a New York attorney, in the face while waiting in a valet line in 2012.

title: Explained: Conditions Of Iran's Nuclear Facilities Amid Israel Conflict
content: After Iran's missile attack on Israel on Tuesday, there is speculation that Israel could strike Iran's nuclear facilities as it has long threatened to do.
summary: After Iran's missile attack on Israel on Tuesday, there is speculation that Israel could strike Iran's nuclear facilities as it has long threatened to do.

title: Benjamin Netanyahu, Israel Defence Minister On Iran's Rumoured 'Hit List'
content: Iran has an 'execution list' of 'Israeli terrorists' - including Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and Defence Minister Yoav Gallant, as well as the commanders of the Israel's Army, Navy, and Air Force - according to a poster circulated on X.
summary: Iran has an 'execution list' of 'Israeli terrorists' - including Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and Defence Minister Yoav Gallant, as well as the commanders of the Israel's Army, Navy, and Air Force - according to a poster circulated on X.

title: Opinion: Why Is UK PM Starmer So Upset With Elon Musk?
content: The relationship between Musk and Starmer has been frosty at best since the Labour Party came to power in July. Starmer, many believe, is upset with the American billionaire for his unsavoury remarks on how the Labour government handled the riots.
summary: The relationship between Musk and Starmer has been frosty at best since the Labour Party came to power in July. Starmer, many believe, is upset with the American billionaire for his unsavoury remarks on how the Labour government handled the riots.

title: Amid Iran's Attack, Newlyweds' First Dance In Israel Bunker
content: A video of a newlywed couple in Jerusalem dancing in an underground bunker as Iran strikes missiles has gone viral on the internet.
summary: A video of a newlywed couple in Jerusalem dancing in an underground bunker as Iran strikes missiles has gone viral on the internet.

title: Yemen's Houthis Conduct Drone Attacks On Tel Aviv: "Goals Achieved"
content: Yemen's Houthi rebels conducted drone attacks on "vital targets" in Israel's Tel Aviv, backing the Palestinian and Lebanese wars against Israel.
summary: Yemen's Houthi rebels conducted drone attacks on "vital targets" in Israel's Tel Aviv, backing the Palestinian and Lebanese wars against Israel.

title: Indian-American Professor Researching Dalit Women Gets $8 Lakh "Genius" Grant
content: Shailaja Paik is a distinguished research professor of history at the University of Cincinnati, where she is also an affiliate faculty in Women's, Gender, and Sexuality Studies, and Asian Studies.
summary: Shailaja Paik is a distinguished research professor of history at the University of Cincinnati, where she is also an affiliate faculty in Women's, Gender, and Sexuality Studies, and Asian Studies.

title: World Economic Forum's New Playbook On Funding For Renewable Energy
content: The World Economic Forum has launched the Playbook of Solutions, a digital platform that shares 100 successful ways to unlock funding for clean energy in 47 developing countries.
summary: The World Economic Forum has launched the Playbook of Solutions, a digital platform that shares 100 successful ways to unlock funding for clean energy in 47 developing countries.

title: Scientists Map Fruit Fly Brain, Breakthrough For Human, Animal Insights
content: Scientists announced on Thursday a milestone in neurobiological research with the mapping of the entire brain of an adult fruit fly, a feat that may provide insight into brains across the animal kingdom, including people.
summary: Scientists announced on Thursday a milestone in neurobiological research with the mapping of the entire brain of an adult fruit fly, a feat that may provide insight into brains across the animal kingdom, including people.

title: LIVE: Israel Strikes Beirut, Yemen Carries Out Drone Strikes On Tel Aviv
content: Israel today conducted fresh strikes in Beirut, killing at least six people, a day after its eight soldiers were killed in combat operations in Lebanon.
summary: Israel today conducted fresh strikes in Beirut, killing at least six people, a day after its eight soldiers were killed in combat operations in Lebanon.

title: Indiana Man Sentenced To 16 Years In Jail After Rats 'Disfigure' His Baby
content: A father from Indiana, USA, has been handed the maximum prison sentence of 16 years after his six-month-old baby was severely disfigured in a rat attack inside what prosecutors described as a "house of horrors."
summary: A father from Indiana, USA, has been handed the maximum prison sentence of 16 years after his six-month-old baby was severely disfigured in a rat attack inside what prosecutors described as a "house of horrors."

title: UN Chief Remembers Mahatma Gandhi's Teaching Of Non-violence
content: UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres underscored Mahatma Gandhi's message of non-violence, peace and equality as he voiced deep concern over a world "bristling with violence" and conflicts raging from Ukraine to the Middle East.
summary: UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres underscored Mahatma Gandhi's message of non-violence, peace and equality as he voiced deep concern over a world "bristling with violence" and conflicts raging from Ukraine to the Middle East.

title: Dozens Of Captive Tigers And Lions In Vietnam Die Of Bird Flu
content: Dozens of tigers and lions in captivity died in the past month in southern Vietnam with tests showing they were positive for bird flu, health ministry and state media said.
summary: Dozens of tigers and lions in captivity died in the past month in southern Vietnam with tests showing they were positive for bird flu, health ministry and state media said.

title: Couple Injured In Uber Accident Can't Sue Company Due To Uber Eats Order
content: John McGinty and his wife, Georgia, were involved in an accident in March 2022 when their Uber driver ran a red light and was struck by another vehicle.
summary: John McGinty and his wife, Georgia, were involved in an accident in March 2022 when their Uber driver ran a red light and was struck by another vehicle.
